dict.acceptation: [计算机]程序；例行公事；日常工作；固定节目；
例行的；常规的；日常的；普通的；

sent.orig: Routine ventilatory functions and F V curve configuration were determined with routine methods.
sent.trans: 常规肺通气功能和F－V曲线形状用常规法测定。

sent.orig: Drivers for hardware interrupts will interrupt service routine (ISR) and a deferred procedure call (DPC) routine.
sent.trans: 用户在使用应用程序需将数据和程序调入计算机内存。

sent.orig: Prison life consists of routine, and then mort routine.
sent.trans: 译文：监狱生活充满了一段又一段的例行公事。

sent.orig: CAN understand routine information and articles, and general meaning of non-routine information within a familiar area.
sent.trans: 能阅读例行性的资讯与文章，亦能理解熟悉情境中非例行性的讯息。

sent.orig: Break your routine-Going the same routine, day after day, can be monotonous and depressing.
sent.trans: 打破你的规律：每天都按照一个规律办事会让人觉得单调和沮丧。
